text: Julie & Julia is a 2009 drama-comedy movie. The movie is about two women who have similar first names and like to do similar things. Meryl Streep plays Julia Child. This movie was rated PG-13 by the MPAA. Reviews for Julie & Julia were mostly positive. The overall intake was $129 million. ==References== Category:2000s biographical movies Category:2009 comedy-drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies
title: Julie & Julia
